protein.specific_function: Regulates the mitochondrial permeability transition pore and is essential for cellular survival and development.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Lu G, Ren S, Korge P, Choi J, Dong Y, Weiss J, Koehler C, Chen JN, Wang Y: A novel mitochondrial matrix serine/threonine protein phosphatase regulates the mitochondria permeability transition pore and is essential for cellular survival and development. Genes Dev. 2007 Apr 1;21(7):784-96. Epub 2007 Mar 20.
